title: Migrate GPU surface descriptors to new types
body:
With the update of m67, skia has changed the way GPU surfaces are created.

 - `GRBackendRenderTargetDesc` has been replaced with `GRBackendRenderTarget`
 - `GRBackendTextureDesc`/`GRGlBackendTextureDesc` has been replaced with `GRBackendTexture`

I have ensured that there is 100% backwards compatibility with the previous API, but I cannot say for how long this will be able to work as Google may introduce a breaking change.

The various views (both native and Xamarin.Forms) need to be updated to use these new types. They currently work, but will give many obsolete warnings.
